The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Wednesday 

Cream Carrot Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (carrot, celery, white onion, potato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

String Beans with Dill – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (green beans, tomato, dill, garlic, white onion, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chocolate, Vanilla and Raspberry Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (almonds, cashew, natural cocoa , alkaline cocoa, raspberry, vanilla, orange, cocoa butter, unfiltered honey)
